comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Sounds fun! Is it icy there or did you not get much snow? Last night, we were unfortunate to get an upstairs neighbor who either walked everywhere on stilts or with cinder-block shoes. To top it off, they were also hyperactive insomniacsâ€”I mean, who draws a bath at 12:30a? Oh well. Off to Lake Tahoe and the Hyatt tonight. Hopefully they have better sound-proofing.
